text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well then! Let's begin team practice! Are you all prepared!?

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I want to check out everyone's endurance, 
so let's run the slope course today!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Here～! Let's run on a hillside course with a unicycle! I found it 
in the equipment warehouse this morning!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Why suddenly a unicycle!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You don't understand? Why did I come up with such a plan… Isn't 
it because it was interesting what else!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Becuase of that!? Doesn't it matter to endurance!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Then I'll raise the difficulty even more!! The one who drinks 
water the least number of times wins!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
It's a match between everyone!? Let's do it! Oh, it's better to 
lay a board on the course. I'll go prepare!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you're motivated! It's okay! So today we're 
going to play a unicycle match with everyone!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The loser is going to make yakisoba bread 
for everyone on the way home!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: This challenge, I accept it!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Um, I'm sorry to ask you to take the 2nd section in my place…!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
It's nothing… it can't be helped. If you get to do a Kendama or a 
3-point shot as a mission, you're hopeless at those.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Top Road-san's swimming is as dynamic as a dolphin show!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Wa-Wait… Looks like she is close to drowning Doto!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah, here comes Top Road-san… Ehh～!? She 
rushed into the bush with her bicycle!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah-hahaha! What a meeting with the tree fairy 
pretending to be unbent? Makes you jealous!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Geez, you don't usually ride a bicycle. It's faster to run. It's 
can't be helped if you can't ride.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Ah, haha… I'm not good at those small things. That's why I was 
hesitant to participate in the Triathlon in the first place…

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Now that I've been entrusted with the run, I will 
fulfill my responsibilities firmly! Ayabe-san, 
thank you for running together with me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Heh… heh…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Ayabe-san is still behind… If I spurt from here… I can do it!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Huh…!?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Ahh…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (Ayabe-san…! What a last leg…!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Agh… Haaaaa～!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
(I have to make this faster or it won't work… But, if the 
distance is a little longer at the current timing…!)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
…Should we keep the same distance next time? 
I would like to try a longer distance.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ! That's right…! I want to extend the distance!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ーIt's about time for me to leave.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ah… I'll just run a little more!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: That so. Don't go off-road. Then, I will go first

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your time today!! Thank you for your hard work!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
(I finally understand after running with Ayabe-san. I have to 
study more pace allocation and course taking…)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
(Because of my clumsiness I couldn't swim or 
bike, so I have to do my best at running!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Alright! Let's increase the time for 
both research and self-training!
